casebody.data:
October 23, 1961. No. 357,

October Term, 1960.

United States v. Consolidated Edison Co. of New York, Inc., James K. Polk, Richard Joyce Smith and Julius M. Jacobs, for respondent, in opposition.

366 U. S. 380. Motion of A. Chauncey Newlin for leave to file petition for rehearing, as amicus curiae, denied.
